summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganRemove makeup and nourish skin in one step with Aveeno Calm + Restore Makeup Remover face Wipes. These 100% plant-based cloths are formulated with oat extract and calming feverfew.
details: DetailsBenefitsAveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Makeup Remover Facial Wipes for daily use100% plant-based cleansing cloths are gentle and nourishingEffortlessly removes all makeup, even waterproof mascara, without stripping skinPre-moistened, disposable face wipes formulated with oat extract and calming feverfewMakeup removing cleansing towelettes leave skin feeling fresh, balanced, and comfortableHypoallergenic, ophthalmologist tested cleansing cloths can be used once dailyFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensAlcoholDyesSulfatesPhthalatesResearch Results92% of testers say makeup removing wipes from a dermatologist-recommended brand are gentle on skinItem 2587059How To UseGently wipe over eyelids, face, lips, and neck. There is no need to rinse. Use daily; day or night. After removing towelette, reseal package to keep wipes moist. Dispose of the towelette in trash receptacle (do not flush).IngredientsWater, Decyl Isostearate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Hexylene Glycol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Trisiloxane, Phenoxyethanol, Sucrose Cocoate, Chlorphenesin, Panthenol, Polysorbate 20, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Glycerin, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Flower/Leaf/Stem Juice, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract.
how_to_use: Gently wipe over eyelids, face, lips, and neck. There is no need to rinse. Use daily; day or night. After removing towelette, reseal package to keep wipes moist. Dispose of the towelette in trash receptacle (do not flush).

reviews.headline: Like but not love
reviews.comments: I like these wipes they do the job but they leave my skin dry and they also made my eyes burn from a residue I'm assuming. They're great wipes but not for me.

reviews.headline: Yes of course I love it
Best face wipe on the market (from a derm)
reviews.comments: I'm a research chemist and physician (M.D.). these are flat out the best face wipes on the market. they could charge 300% more for these but they don't. they aren't just gentle they are soothing. they get every little bit of makeup off sans irritation.

reviews.headline: Pretty sensitive eyes and these are great
reviews.comments: Switched from cetaphil to these cuz a little cheaper and I actually like these better

reviews.headline: I buy these wipes again and again
reviews.comments: Best wipes ever for sensitive skin. Unscented, gentle overall fabulous!

reviews.headline: A staple
reviews.comments: These are my favorite makeup games IEPs. I have used other brands and I always go back to these exact ones. I wet them a little and squeeze excess water out. It does a great job removing my makeup before my skincare routine, or on nights when I'm too tired to do my full routine. They don't irritate and leave my skin feeling soft.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Use to remove face makeup; works great not greasy cleans thoroughly.

reviews.headline: Gentle
reviews.comments: I find these very gentle and not drying even if I forget to put moisturizer on after

reviews.headline: strong
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin. I patch tested these on my neck and cheeks. My cheeks were very inflamed for nearly a day. My neck also felt very itchy and developed a mini rash. Wouldn't recommend for those of super sensitive skin.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've tried countless makeup removers over the years, but none compare to the Aveeno Calm + Restore Nourishing Makeup Remover Face Wipesâ€”they are, without a doubt, my holy grail! These wipes are incredibly gentle yet effective, easily removing makeup (even waterproof mascara!) without any tugging or irritation.

What I love most is how soothing they are on my skin. My skin is quite sensitive, and I often struggle with products that leave me feeling dry or tight afterward, but these wipes are different. They leave my face feeling soft, refreshed, and perfectly hydrated, thanks to the nourishing oat extract. I also appreciate that they're free from harsh fragrances, making them a great choice for anyone with sensitive skin.

Not only do they do an amazing job at removing makeup, but they're also incredibly convenient for those late nights when I just want to cleanse my face quickly before bed. I love that I don't have to rinse or follow up with a cleanser, as my skin feels thoroughly cleansed and balanced.

If you're looking for a gentle yet effective makeup remover that hydrates while cleansing, these wipes are an absolute must-have. I can't imagine my skincare routine without them!
faceoff_positive.headline: Holy grail- they fix my skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: These don't smell as good and they sting. The new packaging is also terrible - the wipes are just going to dry out. Please bring back the Ultra Calming version and the old packaging.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as good as ultra calming wipes.
